name: Lip Smoothie Vitamin C + Peptide Lip Balm
about: What it is:Â A nourishing daily lip balm powered by peptides and vitamin C thatâ€™s clinically proven to visibly plump, smooth, and reduce lip lines while locking in moistureâ€”quickly and over time with a clear glossy finish...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness..Formulation: Balm..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Peptides: Visibly plumps and smooths lips..- Vitamin C: Smooths the look of lines...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This is a peptide-powered smoothie for your lips. Packed with a blend of peptides and vitamin C, this clinically proven lip balm quickly visibly plumps, smooths the look of lines, and leaves a clear high-gloss finish for up to eight hours. Lips are left pillowy soft and sealed with moisture, volume, and juicy shine...Clinical Results: Based on clinical testing on 35 subjects after one use:.-Clinically-proven to lock in moisture for 8 hours.-100% showed plumper lips.-100% showed reduced lip lines.-100% showed smoother lip texture..
ingredients: -Peptides: Visibly plumps and smooths lips....-Vitamin C: Smooths the look of lines....Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polybutene, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Synthetic Wax, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Brassica Campestris/Aleurites Fordi Oil Copolymer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Leaf Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Melia Azadirachta Extract, Tocopherol, Tribehenin, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Malic Acid, Lactic Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Amber Powder, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Flavor/ Aroma*, Limonene (*Natural Flavor / ArÃ´me Naturel)......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply as need. For external use only..-Pro tip: Use as a lip primer and use on top of lipstick as a gloss....Recycling Instructions:.-Recyclable aluminum cap, glass jar and paper carton materials

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am quite the lip balm fanatic and this is amazing! I am not the biggest fan of pot lip balms, but if I were to get one it would be this one. Itâ€™s not too thick, it doesnâ€™t leave a weird residue after a bit and it is SO soft! And the honey vanilla sent smells just like a maple bar itâ€™s delish soft.
It makes my lips so soft and does actually give a plumping effect without a burning sensation. I've repurchased the honey + vanilla at least 3 times now. It smells divine. 100% recommend

reviews.review_title: Finally something I like MORE than Laneige
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I consider myself to be pretty obsessed with lip products.  I thought after I went through my 5th or 6th vanilla Laneige, I thought I could safely say it was my favorite.  My only hesitation with Farmacy is the honey flavors/fragrance of the products, just cause honey isn't my favorite smell.  But, the flavors of the Lip Smoothies I've tried here--Pear Kiwi and Apple--they are the most pleasant smelling/tasting lip products I've ever tried.  They are so clean smelling, and there isn't unneeded sweetener added, I believe.  Let me also say that there is zero taste of lip balm' in this product--that is something that drives me crazy.  Fenty Skin Plush Puddin' has a faint taste of lip balm that is unpleasant to me.  If you love the thick, dense feeling of that Plush Puddin', by the way, you'll find this product to be the opposite of that.  I enjoy both products, but Lip Smoothie is much more of a pleasant experience.    Now, the formula is VERY soft and 'melting'.  It almost feels like oil on the lips, but not greasy or slimy.  It's a much more thin formula than I was expecting, and I was unsure about it at first.  But, after a couple weeks of use, I knew it was the best formula I had in the house - out of too many to count.  I felt like I was applying Laneige all day just out of habit, but I don't need to reach for the Lip Smoothie nearly as much.    I say if you've been on the fence about this one, just consider the one point I've made:  what this product does while on the lips is very impressive--so the wear time isn't the only thing to consider.  A thinner product may not seem to last quite as long lasting as other lip butters you've used, BUT...my lips are so hydrated after using this, I don't need to constantly reach for others.    The packaging is glass and pretty heavy. also much nicer than tubes or plastic.  This product deservers more attention.
Finally found something to smoothen out my lips and that doesnâ€™t dry out my lips. I highly recommend.

Lots of lip balms that I have tried, like Laneige, have not worked for me, so when I tried this I was surprised by how well this worked on my lips. Itâ€™s such a smooth, buttery lip balm, itâ€™s so soothing.

reviews.review_text: Iâ€™ve used Apple and now Honey Vanilla and both work so well to moisturize my lips. I put it on every night as the last step in my skincare routine. There is still product on my lips when I wake up in the morning. This product has replaced my laneige lip mask.
Awful. Do not purchase. Dried out my lips completely.
